title: GREAT EXAMPLE OF ARABIC AND EGYPTIAN CULTURE
text: Entering Petra's valey you feel like being part of a Hollywood movie. The scenery, the colours and the pourity of materials create a calmness inside your soul. But allof these are ruined by the torture of the animals, the vomiting stink and the constant fear of being througn down by the rushing shouting Arabs going up and down the narrow paths.

title: Nice surprice
text: We heard about this ice place from locals, so we where a little bit in doubt, because most of the places in Kalymnos were average. But the place is very nicely decorated and the cocktails delicius. The service needs to show little more cheered up.

title: Goddess's Athina Temple
text: ThÎ¹s temple is the crown of a civilization, was the symbol tried to conquered by many. An architecture marvel of the ancient people. Worth to read about the details of the design and the construction to have a complete eperience when you visit.

title: The history unveiled
text: All around and on top of these rocks are the elements of the base of the western civilization. These small castle creates houge emotions as you enter its gates through the marble columns (the propylea). Worth the walk and the heat of an Athenian day.

title: ARCHITECTURE AT ITS FINEST
text: I visited the place at night hours. I could not imagine a better presentation of the ancient civilisations existed in the area. During the tour, the continuous visual contact with the Acropolis creates a spiritual filling.

title: Calmness in the center of Athens
text: The historical architecture blends with the modern renovation. We stayed in first floor and the room had a very spacious and bright feeling. We went everywhere by foot. The spot is like leaving in the neighborhood of the old town. The bells of the metropolitan church were not a problem for us beacause there are a lot of bars with tasty cocktails around! The rooftop bar-restaurant is a hot spot and we had to book a day before.
